description:
The Walking Dead's extended family will reunite in October 2014!《行尸走肉》大家庭将会在2014年10月再重逢。

AMC had already renewed The Walking Dead for Season 5, but they recently confirmed the October premiere month and also renewed the post-show therapy session, Talking Dead.AMC电视台已经宣布续订《行尸走肉》第五季，不过最近公布了开播时间是2014年10月，一起被续订的还有该剧的衍生节目《Talking Dead》。

Showrunner Scott Gimple gets to keep his job into Season 5, and possibly beyond, and having Talking Dead return means we get to see more of the franchise's unsung hero, Chris Hardwick.而该剧的制作人Scott Gimple将会继续指导第五季，另外《Talking Dead》的续订可能意味着我们将会看到Chris Hardwick的更多精彩表现。

AMC just announced a bunch of 2014 premiere dates, but didn't give The Walking Dead and Talking Dead a specific date in October. In October 2013, they renewed the show for Season 5; in January they confirmed it will be in October 2014; and maybe over the summer at Comic-Con they'll give us an official premiere date.AMC这次宣布了很多节目2014年的开播日期，不过没有公布《行尸走肉》和《Talking Dead》的具体播出时间。2013年10月《行尸走肉》被宣布续订第五季；1月被电视剧宣布10月开播，很可能会在明年的动漫大会上公布具体开播时间。
